title: Looking for Mature Players 20Yrs+
body:
Hi Gals and Pals

Im Atari

I'm looking for mature players who are looking to take this game seriously

Preferred Requirements

20yrs and Over
500 and Over Normal Wins
Looking to take this game seriously as a sport, not just a hobbie
Can play at least a couple games daily, Excluding weekends
From NZ or AuZ and can speak English

Add me in game "Demon Incarnate"

replies.body: I'm more then keen brother. i am 22, spend a good amount of time playing this game, I would like to start ranked, i only have about 315 wins though. Ill add you anyway and we can play some normals :)
I have more losses then wins, by a fair bit, does this count?

im a support main 23 years old on every afternoon after work with almost 600 wins, played as a support for gold and plat players in the past, will add you when i get home and see if we can raise a little hell

keen i'm plat 5, over 2k normal wins, 20 years old and australian
just looking to have a group of people that will stay together and gain synergy

Keep them coming gals and pals

Just crated a team name "Relic" cuz were old relics :P

Those are just "preferred requirements"

Ill soon unfriend anyone who i find to be immature though.

GCSBblitzforever. That's fine but dude, half the battle of been good is understanding how other characters work. You don't truly know your enemy till you put yourself in there shoes.... and what happens if they ban ur champ?

> [{quoted}](name=Demon Incarnate,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=0TL1cfLI,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-11-02T03:31:00.404+0000)
 and what happens if they ban ur champ?

Don't think anyone will ever ban singed.
Thanks everyone who has added me. Keep them coming. we will be doing team tryouts soon
Do you take people who just play one champ?
